K07bsu033_u:409: 43. sacenme bhagavan bodhiprāptasya sahanāmadheyaśravaṇāttadanyeṣu lokadhātuṣu bodhisattvā na samantānugataṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabheran,
K07bsu033_u:410: yatra sthitvā bodhisattvā ekakṣaṇavyatihāreṇa aprameyāsaṃkhyeyācinyātulyāparimāṇān buddhān bhagavataḥ satkurvanti,
K07bsu033_u:413: 44. sacenme bhagavan bodhiprāptasya tatra buddhakṣetre ye sattvāḥ pratyājātā bhaveyuḥ te yathārūpāṃ dharmadeśanāmākāṅkṣeyuḥ śrotum,
K07bsu033_u:416: 45. sacenme bhagavan bodhiprāptasya tatra buddhakṣetre tadanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu ye ca bodhisattvā mama nāmadheyaṃ śṛṇuyuḥ,
K07bsu033_u:419: 46. sacenme bhagavan bodhiprāptasya buddhaśāsturbuddhakṣetreṣu te bodhisattvā mama nāmadheyaṃ śṛṇuyuḥ,
K07bsu033_u:423: atha khalvānanda sa dharmākaro bhikṣurimānevaṃrūpān praṇidhānaviśeṣānnirdiśya tasyāṃ velāyām buddhānubhāven imā gāthā abhāṣata -
K07bsu033_u:424: saci mi[siya] viśiṣṭa naivarūpā varapraṇidhāna siyā khu bodhiprāpto /
K07bsu033_u:425: māha siya gavendrasattvasāro daśabaladhāri atulyadakṣiṇīyaḥ // Sukhv_vs_11 //
K07bsu033_u:426: saci mi siya na kṣetra evarūpaṃ bahu adha nānaprabhūtadivyavittam /
K07bsu033_u:427: sukhita naraka yeya duḥkhaprāpto māha siyā ratanāna[loka]rājā // Sukhv_vs_12 //
K07bsu033_u:428: saci mi upagatasya bodhimaṇḍaṃ daśadiśi pravraji nāmadheyu kṣipram /
K07bsu033_u:429: pṛthu bahava ananta buddhakṣetrā māha siyā balaprāptu lokanāthaḥ // Sukhv_vs_13 //
K07bsu033_u:431: saci khu ahu rameya kāmabhogāṃ smṛtimatiyā gatiyā vihīnu santaḥ /
K07bsu033_u:432: atula śiva sameyamāna bodhiṃ māha siyā balaprāptu śāstra loke // Sukhv_vs_14 //
K07bsu033_u:433: vipulaprabha atulyananta nātha diśi vidiśi sphuri sarvabuddhakṣetrā /
K07bsu033_u:434: rāga praśami sarvadoṣamohāṃ narakagatismi praśāmi dhūmaketum // Sukhv_vs_15 //
K07bsu033_u:435: janiya suruciraṃ viśālanetraṃ vidhuniya sarvanarāṇa andhakāram /
K07bsu033_u:436: apaniya su na akṣaṇānaśeṣāṃ upanayi svargagatānanantatejāṃ // Sukhv_vs_16 //
K07bsu033_u:437: na tapati nabha candrasūryaābhā maṇigaṇa agniprabhā na devatānām /
K07bsu033_u:438: abhibhavati narendra ābha sarvāṃ purimacariṃ pariśuddha ācaritvā // Sukhv_vs_17 //
K07bsu033_u:439: puruṣavaru nidhāna duḥkhitānāṃ diśi vidiśāsu na asti evarūpaḥ /
K07bsu033_u:441: purimajina svayaṃbhu satkaritvā vratatapakoṭi caritva aprameyām /
K07bsu033_u:443: yatha bhagava asaṅgajñānadarśī trividha prajānati saṃskṛte narendraḥ /
K07bsu033_u:444: ahamapi siya tulyadakṣiṇīyo vidupravaro naranāyako narāṇām // Sukhv_vs_20 //
K07bsu033_u:445: saci mi ayu narendra evarūpā praṇidhi samṛdhyati bodhi prāpuṇitvā /
K07bsu033_u:446: calatu aya sahasralokadhātu kusumapravarṣaṇa bhātu devasaṃghāṃ // Sukhv_vs_21 //
K07bsu033_u:448: pracalita vasudhā pravarṣi puṣpāḥ tūryaśatā gagane 'tha saṃpraṇeduḥ /
K07bsu033_u:449: divyaruciracandanasya cūrṇā avakiri caiva bhaviṣya loki buddhaḥ // Sukhv_vs_22 //
K07bsu033_u:452: evaṃrūpayā ānanda praṇidhānasaṃpadā sa dharmākaro bhikṣurbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ samanvāgato 'bhūt /
K07bsu033_u:453: evaṃrūpayā cānanda praṇidhānasaṃpadā alpakā bodhisattvāḥ samanvāgatāḥ /
K07bsu033_u:454: alpakānāṃ caivaṃrūpāṇāṃ praṇidhīnāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati parīttānām /
K07bsu033_u:456: sa khalu punarānanda dharmākaro bhikṣustasya bhagavato lokeśvararājasya tathāgatasya
K07bsu033_u:457: purataḥ sadevakasya lokasya samārakasya sabrahmakasya saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ
K07bsu033_u:464: sa daharamanohara eva surato 'bhūtsukhasaṃvāso 'dhivāsanajātīyaḥ subhagaḥ supoṣo
K07bsu033_u:474: sa bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ caran svayaṃ ca dānapāramitāyāmacarat parāṃśca tatraiva samādāpitavān,
K07bsu033_u:479: tatra tatra asyānekāni nidhānakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi dharaṇyāḥ prādurbhavanti /
K07bsu033_u:480: tena bodhisattvacaryāṃ caratā tāvadaprameyāsaṃkhyeyāni sattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpitāni,
K07bsu033_u:482: tāvadaprameyāsaṃkhyeyā buddhā bhagavantaḥ satkṛtā gurukṛtā mānitāḥ pūjitāścīvarapiṇḍapātraśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sarvasukhopadhānasparśavihāraiḥ pratipāditāḥ /
K07bsu033_u:485: evaṃ jāmbūdvīpeśvarāśca pratiṣṭhāpitāścakravartitve lokapālatve śakratve suyāmatve (Sukhv, Vaidya 233)
K07bsu033_u:486: sutuṣitatve sunirmitatve suvaśavartitve devarājatve mahābrahmatve ca pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ /
K07bsu033_u:487: tāvadaprameyāsaṃkhyeyā buddhā bhagavantaḥ satkṛtā gurukṛtā mānitāḥ pūjitāścīvarapiṇḍapātraśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sarvasukhopadhānasparśavihāraiḥ pratipāditāḥ /
K07bsu033_u:490: evaṃ jāmbūdvīpeśvarāśca pratiṣṭhāpitāścakravartitve lokapālatve śakratve suyāmatve sutuṣitatve sunirmitatve vaśavartitve devarājatve mahābrahmatve ca pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ /
K07bsu033_u:491: tāvadaprameyāsaṃkhyeyā buddhā bhagavantaḥ satkṛtā gurukṛtā mānitāḥ pūjitā dharmacakrapravartanārthaṃ cādhīṣṭāḥ,
K07bsu033_u:494: yadasya bodhisattvacaryāṃ carato 'prameyāsaṃkhyeyācintyātulyāmāpyāparimāṇānabhilāpyāni kalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi surabhirdivyātikrāntacandanagandho mukhātpravāti sma /
K07bsu033_u:498: sarvavādyasaṃgītyabhinirhārāśca sarvaromakūpebhyaḥ pāṇitalābhyāṃ ca niścaranti sma /
K07bsu033_u:500: iti hi sarvapariṣkāravaśitāprāptaḥ sa ānanda dharmākaro bhikṣurabhūt pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caran // Sukhv_10 //
K07bsu033_u:502: evamukte āyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat - kiṃ punarbhagavan sa dharmākaro bhikṣurbodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyātītaḥ
K07bsu033_u:503: utāho 'nabhisaṃbuddhaḥ atha pratyutpanno 'bhisaṃbuddha etarhi tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati dharmaṃ ca deśayati?
K07bsu033_u:505: khalu punarānanda sa tathāgato 'tīto na anāgataḥ /
K07bsu033_u:506: api tveva sa tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddha etarhiṃ tiṣṭhati dhriyate
K07bsu033_u:507: yāpayati dharmaṃ ca deśayati paścimāyāṃ diśi ito koṭīniyutaśatasahasratame ca buddhakṣetre
K07bsu033_u:509: parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto 'nantaiḥ śrāvakairanantayā buddhakṣetrasaṃpadā samanvāgataḥ // Sukhv_11 //
K07bsu033_u:511: amitā cāsya prabhā yasya na sukaraṃ pramāṇaparyantamadhigantum - iyanti buddhakṣetraśatāni,
K07bsu033_u:519: api tu khalu punarānanda saṃkṣiptena pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamāni buddhakṣetrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi tayā tasya bhagavato 'mitābhasya prabhayā sadā sphuṭāni /
K07bsu033_u:520: evaṃ dakṣiṇapaścimottarāsvadha ūrdhvaṃ digvidikṣu ca ekaikasyāṃ diśi samantādgaṅgānadīvālukopamāni yāvadbuddhakṣetrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi (Sukhv, Vaidya 234)
K07bsu033_u:521: tasya bhagavato 'mitābhasya prabhayā sadā parisphuṭāni sthāpayitvā buddhān bhagavataḥ
K07bsu033_u:525: nāstyānanda upamopanyāso yena śakyaṃ tasyāmitābhasya tathāgatasya prabhāyāḥ pramāṇamudgrahītum /
K07bsu033_u:532: sā ca āryaprabhā vimalā vipulā kāyasukhasaṃjananī cittaudvilyakaraṇī devāsuranāgayakṣagandharvagaruḍamahoragakinnaramanuṣyāmanuṣyāṇāṃ
K07bsu033_u:535: anena cānanda paryāyeṇa tathāgataḥ paripūrṇaṃ kalpaṃ bhāṣyet tasyāmitābhasya tathāgatasya nāma karmopādāya prabhāmārabhya,
K07bsu033_u:536: na ca śaknoti guṇaparyantamadhigantuṃ tasyāḥ prabhāyāḥ,
K07bsu033_u:539: ubhayamapyetadānanda aprameyamasaṃkhyeyamacintyāparyantaṃ yadidaṃ tasya bhagavato 'mitābhasya tathāgatasya prabhāguṇavibhūtiḥ,
K07bsu033_u:542: tasya khalu punarānanda amitābhasya tathāgatasyāprameyaḥ śrāvakasaṃgho yasya na sukaraṃ pramāṇamudgrahītum - iyatyaḥ śrāvakakoṭyaḥ,
K07bsu033_u:560: sa ākāṅkṣan trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātau yāvanti tārārūpāṇi tāni sarvāṇyekarātridine nagareṇa gaṇayet,
K07bsu033_u:562: te ca varṣakoṭīniyutaśatasahasramananyakarmaṇā amitābhasya tathāgatasya prathamaśrāvakasaṃnipātaṃ gaṇayeyuḥ /
K07bsu033_u:563: ebhirgaṇayadbhiḥ śatatamo 'pi bhāgo na gaṇito bhavet,
K07bsu033_u:565: yāvatkalāmapi upamāmapi upanisāmapi na gaṇito bhavet /
K07bsu033_u:566: tadyathā ānanda mahāsamudrāccaturaśītiyojanasahasrāṇyāvedhena tiryagaprameyāt kaścideva puruṣaḥ śatadhā bhinnayā bālāgrakoṭyā ekamudakabindumabhyutkṣipet,
K07bsu033_u:567: tatkiṃ manyase ānanda katamo 'tra bahutaraḥ - yo vā śatadhā bhinnayā bālāgrakoṭyābhyutkṣipta eka udakabinduḥ,
K07bsu033_u:569: ānanda āha - yojanasahasramapi tāvadbhagavan mahāsamudrasya parīttaṃ bhavet kimaṅga punaḥ śatadhā bhinnayā bālāgrakoṭyā (Sukhv, Vaidya 235)
K07bsu033_u:577: evamanantāparyantastasya bhagavataḥ śrāvakasaṃgho yo 'prameyāsaṃkhyeya ityeva saṃkhyāṃ gacchati // Sukhv_13 //
K07bsu033_u:579: aparimitaṃ ca ānanda tasya bhagavato 'mitābhasya tathāgatasyāyuḥpramāṇaṃ yasya na sukaraṃ pramāṇamadhigantum,
K07bsu033_u:588: atha tarhi ānanda aparimitameva tasya bhagavat āyuḥpramāṇamaparyantam /
K07bsu033_u:591: tathā sāṃprataṃ daśa kalpāstasya bhagavato 'mitāyuṣastathāgatasyotpannasya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya // Sukhv_14 //
K07bsu033_u:593: tasya khalu punarānanda bhagavato 'mitābhasya sukhāvatī nāma lokadhāturṛddhā ca sphītā ca kṣemā ca subhikṣā ca ramaṇīyā ca bahudevamanuṣyākīrṇā ca /
K07bsu033_u:594: tatra khalvānanda lokadhātau na nirayāḥ santi na tiryagyonirna pretaviṣayo nāsurāḥ kāyā nākṣaṇopapattayaḥ /
K07bsu033_u:595: na ca tāni ratnāni loke pracaranti yāni sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau vidyante // Sukhv_15 //
K07bsu033_u:597: sā khalvānanda sukhāvatī lokadhātuḥ surabhinānāgandhasamīritā nānāpuṣpaphalasamṛddhā ratnavṛkṣasamalaṃkṛtā tathāgatābhinirmitamanojñasvaranānādvijasaṃghaniṣevitā
K07bsu033_u:598: te cānanda ratnavṛkṣā nānāvarṇā anekavarṇā anekaśatasahasravarṇāḥ /
K07bsu033_u:606: santi kecid dvayo ratnayoḥ suvarṇasya rūpyasya ca /
K07bsu033_u:607: santi trayāṇāṃ ratnānāṃ suvarṇasya rūpyasya vaiḍūryasya ca /
K07bsu033_u:608: santi caturṇāṃ ratnānāṃ suvarṇasya rūpyasya vaiḍūryasya sphaṭikasya ca /
K07bsu033_u:609: santi pañcānāṃ ratnānāṃ suvarṇasya rūpyasya vaiḍūryasya sphaṭikasya musāragalvasya ca /
K07bsu033_u:610: santi ṣaṇṇāṃ ratnānāṃ suvarṇasya rūpyasya vaiḍūryasya sphaṭikasya musāragalvasya lohitamuktāyāśca /
K07bsu033_u:611: santi saptānāṃ ratnānāṃ suvarṇasya rūpyasya vaiḍūryasya sphaṭikasya musāragalvasya lohitamuktāyā aśmagarbhasya ca saptamasya /
K07bsu033_u:681: sarveṣāṃ cānanda teṣāṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ mūlaskandhaviṭapaśākhāpatrapuṣpaphalāni sukhasaṃsparśāni sugandhīni /
K07bsu033_u:682: vātena preritena ca teṣāṃ valgumanojñaghoṣo niścaratyasecanako 'pratikūlaḥ śravaṇāya /
K07bsu033_u:683: evaṃrūpairānanda saptaratnamayairvṛkṣaiḥ saṃtataṃ tadbuddhakṣetraṃ samantācca kadalīskandhaiḥ
K07bsu033_u:692: yāni pūrvasyāṃ diśyaprameyāsaṃkhyeyāsu lokadhātuṣu gatvā sattvebhyo dharmaṃ deśayanti /
K07bsu033_u:693: evaṃ dakṣiṇapaścimottarāsu dikṣu adha ūrdhvamanuvidikṣu gatāvaraṇe loke 'prameyāsaṃkhyeyāṃllokadhātūn gatiṃ gattvā sattvebhyo dharmaṃ deśayanti
K07bsu033_u:696: tasmin khalu punarānanda buddhakṣetre sarvaśaḥ kālaparvatā na santi sarvato ratnaparvatāḥ sarvaśaḥ sumeravaḥ parvatarājāḥ sarvaśaścakravālā mahācakravālāḥ parvatarājāḥ /
K07bsu033_u:697: samantācca tadbuddhakṣetraṃ samaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ pāṇitalajātaṃ nānāvidharatnamaṇicitabhūmibhāgam /
K07bsu033_u:698: evamukte āyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat - ye ca punaste bhagavaṃścāturmahārājakāyikā devāḥ sumerupārśvanivāsinastrāyastriṃśā vā sumerumūrdhni
K07bsu033_u:700: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase ānanda ye te iha sumeroḥ parvatarājasyopari yāmā devāstuṣitā
K07bsu033_u:701: vā nirmāṇaratayo vā paranirmitavaśavartino vā brahmakāyikā vā brahmapurohitā vā mahābrahmāṇo
K07bsu033_u:704: ānanda āha - acintyo bhagavan karmaṇāṃ vipākaḥ karmābhisaṃskāraḥ /
K07bsu033_u:705: bhagavānāha - labdhastvayānanda ihācintyaḥ karmaṇāṃ vipākaḥ karmābhisaṃskāro na buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmacintyaṃ buddhādhiṣṭhānaṃ kṛtapuṇyānāṃ ca sattvānāmavaropitakuśalamūlānām /
K07bsu033_u:707: ānanda āha - na me 'tra bhagavan kācitkāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā /
K07bsu033_u:708: api tu khalvahamanāgatānāṃ sattvānāṃ kāṅkṣāvimativicikitsānirghātāya tathāgatametadarthaṃ paripṛcchāmi /
K07bsu033_u:712: tasyāṃ khalvānanda sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau nānāprakārā nadyaḥ pracaranti /
K07bsu033_u:715: sarvāśca tā nadyaḥ sukhavāhinyo nānāsurabhigandhavārivāhinyo nānāratnalulitapuṣpasaṃghātavāhinyo nānāmadhurasvaranirghoṣāḥ /
K07bsu033_u:717: kuśalaiḥ saṃpravāditasya tāvanmanojñaghoṣo niścarati yathārūpastāsāṃ mahānadīnāṃ
K07bsu033_u:718: nirghoṣo niścarati gambhīro 'jñeyo 'vijñeyo 'nelaḥ karṇasukho hṛdayaṃgamaḥ premaṇīyo
K07bsu033_u:720: anityaṃ śāntamanātmeti sukhaśravanīyo yasteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ śrotrendriyābhāsamāgacchati /
K07bsu033_u:721: tāsāṃ khalu punarānanda mahānadīnāmubhayatastīrāṇi nānāgandharatnavṛkṣaiḥ saṃtatāni,
K07bsu033_u:723: tatra ye sattvāsteṣu nadītīreṣvākāṅkṣanti divyābhirāmaramaṇīyāṃ ratikrīḍāṃ cānubhavitum,
K07bsu033_u:724: teṣāṃ tatra nadīṣvavatīrṇānāmākāṅkṣatāṃ gulphamātraṃ vāri saṃtiṣṭhate /
K07bsu033_u:728: tatra ye sattvā ākāṅkṣanti śītaṃ vāri bhavatviti,
K07bsu033_u:738: tatra yadā te sattvā ākāṅkṣanti kīdṛśā (Sukhv, Vaidya 238)
K07bsu033_u:741: yaścāsāvānanda tasya vāriṇo nirghoṣaḥ sa manojño niścarati,
K07bsu033_u:743: ye ca sattvā nadītīreṣu sthitā ākāṅkṣanti mā asmākamayaṃ śabdaḥ śrotrendriyāvabhāsamāgacchatviti,
K07bsu033_u:747: tadyathā - buddhaśabdaṃ dharmaśabdaṃ saṃghaśabdaṃ pāramitāśabdaṃ bhūmiśabdaṃ balaśabdaṃ
K07bsu033_u:750: śrutvā udāraprītiprāmodyaṃ pratilabhate vivekasahagataṃ virāgasahagataṃ śāntasahagataṃ nirodhasahagataṃ dharmasahagataṃ bodhipariniṣpattikuśalamūlasahagataṃ ca /
K07bsu033_u:757: tadanena ānanda paryāyeṇa sā lokadhātuḥ sukhāvatītyucyate saṃkṣiptena,
K07bsu033_u:758: na punarvistareṇa kalpo 'pyānanda parikṣayaṃ gacchetsukhāvatyā lokadhātoḥ sukhakāraṇeṣu parikīrtyamāneṣu,
K07bsu033_u:759: na tveva śakyaṃ teṣāṃ sukhakāraṇānāṃ paryantamadhigantum // Sukhv_18 //
K07bsu033_u:761: tasyāṃ khalu punarānanda sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau ye sattvāḥ pratyājātāḥ pratyājaniṣyante,
K07bsu033_u:762: sarve te evaṃrūpeṇa varṇena balena sthāmnā ārohapariṇāhena ādhipatyena puṇyasaṃcayena
K07bsu033_u:766: na khalu punarānanda sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau sattvā audārikayūṣaphāṇitākārāhāramāharanti /
K07bsu033_u:770: na teṣāṃ bhūyaḥ kāye prakṣepaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
K07bsu033_u:771: te prīṇitakāyāstathārūpāṇi gandhajātānyākāṅkṣanti - īddaśaireva gandhajātairdivyaistadbuddhakṣetraṃ sarvameva nirdhūpitaṃ bhavati /
K07bsu033_u:773: tasya sarvaśo gandharvarājño vāsanā na samudācarati /
K07bsu033_u:775: teṣāṃ tathārūpaiśca taiḥ sarvaṃ tadbuddhakṣetraṃ parisphuṭaṃ bhavati /
K07bsu033_u:777: teṣāṃ tādṛśaireva cīvararatnaiḥ sarvaṃ tadbuddhakṣetraṃ parisphuṭaṃ bhavati,
K07bsu033_u:780: tadyathā - śīrṣābharaṇāni vā karṇābharaṇāni vā grīvābharaṇāni vā hastapādābharaṇāni
K07bsu033_u:781: vā yadidaṃ mukuṭāni kuṇḍalāni kaṭakakeyūrāṇi vatsahārā rūcakahārā karṇikā mudrikāḥ
K07bsu033_u:782: svarṇasūtrāṇi mekhalāḥ svarṇasūtāṇi jālāni muktājālāni sarvaratnajālāni svarṇaratnakiṅkiṇījālāni,
K07bsu033_u:786: te yādṛśaṃ vimānamākāṅkṣanti yadvarṇaliṅgasaṃsthānaṃ yāvadārohapariṇāhaṃ nānāratnamayaniryūhaśatasahasrasamalaṃkṛtaṃ nānādivyapuṣpasaṃstīrṇaṃ
K07bsu033_u:788: teṣu manonirvṛtteṣu vimāneṣu saptasaptāsparasahasraparivṛtāḥ puraskṛtā viharanti krīḍanti ramante paricārayanti // Sukhv_19 //
K07bsu033_u:790: na ca tatra lokadhātau devānāṃ vā manuṣyāṇāṃ vā nānātvamasti anyatra saṃvṛtivyavahāreṇa devamanuṣyāviti saṃkhyāṃ gacchanti /
K07bsu033_u:791: tadyathā ānanda rājñaścakravartinaḥ purato manuṣyahīno manuṣyapretako na bhāsate na tapate na virocate,
K07bsu033_u:792: na ca bhavati viśārado na prabhāśvaraḥ,
K07bsu033_u:793: evameva devānāṃ paranirmitavaśavartināṃ purataḥ śakro devānāmindro na bhāsate na
K07bsu033_u:794: tapate na virocate yadidamudyānavimānavastrābharaṇairādhipatyena ṛddhyā vā prātihāryeṇa
K07bsu033_u:798: evaṃ sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau manuṣyā draṣṭavyāḥ // Sukhv_20 //
K07bsu033_u:800: tasyāṃ khalu punarānanda sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau pūrvāhṇakālasamaye pratyupasthite samantāccaturdiśamākulāḥ samākulā vāyavo vānti /
K07bsu033_u:801: teṣāṃ ratnavṛkṣāṇāṃ citrān darśanīyān nānāvarṇānanekavṛntān nānāsurabhidivyagandhaparivāsitān
K07bsu033_u:802: kṣobhayanti saṃkṣobhayanti īrayanti samīrayanti yato bahūni puṣpaśatāni tasyāṃ ratnamayyāṃ
K07bsu033_u:805: tadyathāpi nāma puruṣaḥ kuśalaḥ pṛthivyāṃ puṣpasaṃstaraṃ saṃstṛṇuyāt,
K07bsu033_u:807: evameva tadbuddhakṣetraṃ taiḥ puṣpairnānāgandhavarṇaiḥ samantātsaptapauruṣaṃ sphuṭaṃ bhavati /
K07bsu033_u:808: tāni ca puṣpajātāni mṛdūni kācilindikasukhasaṃsparśāni aupamyamātreṇa,
K07bsu033_u:811: nirgate punaḥ pūrvāhṇakālasamaye tāni puṣpāṇi niravaśeṣamantardhīyante /
K07bsu033_u:812: athe tadbuddhakṣetraṃ viviktaṃ ramyaṃ śubhaṃ bhavatyaparikliṣṭaiḥ pūrvapuṣpaiḥ /
K07bsu033_u:816: evaṃ madhyāhnakālasamaye saṃdhyāyāṃ rātryāḥ prathame yāme madhyame yāme paścime yāme /
K07bsu033_u:817: taiśca vātairvāyadbhirnānāgandhaparivāsitaiste sattvāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ santaḥ evaṃ sukhasamarpitā bhavanti tadyathāpi nāma nirodhasamāpanno bhikṣuḥ
K07bsu033_u:819: tasmiścānanda buddhakṣetre sarvaśo 'gnisūryacandragrahanakṣatratārārūpāṇāṃ tamondhakārasya nāmadheyaprajñapraptirapi nāsti /
K07bsu033_u:820: sarvaśo rātriṃdivaṃ prajñaptirapi nāsti anyatra tathāgatavyavahārāt,
K07bsu033_u:823: tasyāṃ khalu punarānanda sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau kāle divyagandhodakameghā abhipravarṣayanti divyāni sarvavarṇikāni kusumāni,
K07bsu033_u:834: tasmin khalu punarānanda buddhakṣetre ye sattvā upapannā utpadyante utpasyante,
K07bsu033_u:837: nāsti tatra dvayo rāśyorvyavasthānaṃ prajñaptirvā yadidamaniyatasya vā mithyātvaniyatasya vā /
K07bsu033_u:838: tadanenāpyānanda paryāyeṇa sā lokadhātuḥ sukhāvatītyucyate saṃkṣiptena,
K07bsu033_u:840: kalpo 'pyānanda parikṣīyeta sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau sukhakāraṇeṣu parikīrtyamāneṣu,
K07bsu033_u:841: na ca teṣāṃ sukhakāraṇānāṃ śakyaṃ paryantamadhigantum // Sukhv_24 //
K07bsu033_u:843: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
K07bsu033_u:845: te kalpakoṭīmatha vāpi cottariṃ sukhāvatīvarṇa prakāśayeyuḥ // Sukhv_vs_23 //
K07bsu033_u:846: kṣaye kalpakoṭī vajre surāśca sukhāvatīye na ca varṇasāruḥ /
K07bsu033_u:847: kṣayaṃ na gacchetpratibhā ca teṣāṃ prakāśayantāna tu varṇa nānāṃ // Sukhv_vs_24 //
K07bsu033_u:848: ye lokadhātū paramāṇusādṛśāṃśchidyeya bhidyeya rajaśca kuryāt /
K07bsu033_u:849: ato bahū uttari lokadhātu pūreta dānaṃ ratanāhi dadyāt // Sukhv_vs_25 //
K07bsu033_u:850: naitā kalāpi upamāpi tasya puṇyasya bhontī pṛthulokadhātavaḥ /
K07bsu033_u:851: ye lokadhātūya sukhāvatīye śrutvaiva nāmaṃ bhavatīha puṇyam // Sukhv_vs_26 //
K07bsu033_u:852: tato bahū puṇya bhaveta teṣāṃ ye śraddhate jinavacanaṃ saprajñāḥ /
K07bsu033_u:853: śraddhā hi mūlaṃ jagatasya prāptaye tasmāddhi śrutvā vicitiṃ vinodayet // Sukhv_vs_27 //
K07bsu033_u:857: tasya khalu punarānanda bhagavato 'mitābhasya tathāgatasya daśasu dikṣu ekaikasyāṃ
K07bsu033_u:858: diśi gaṅgānadīvālukāsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣu gaṅgānadīvālukāsamā buddhā bhagavanto nāmadheyaṃ (Sukhv, Vaidya 241)
K07bsu033_u:868: ye cānanda kecitsattvāstaṃ tathāgataṃ punaḥ satkāramanasikariṣyanti,
K07bsu033_u:871: teṣāṃ so 'mitābhastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho maraṇakālasamaye pratyupasthite 'nekabhikṣugaṇaparivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ sthāsyati /
K07bsu033_u:872: tataste taṃ bhagavantaṃ dṛṣṭvā prasannacittāścyutāḥ santastatraiva sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvupapatsyante /
K07bsu033_u:873: yaśca ānanda ākāṅkṣeta kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā kimityahaṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme tamamitābhaṃ tathāgataṃ paśyeyamiti,
K07bsu033_u:874: tenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya adhyāśayātiśayatayā saṃtatyā tasmin buddhakṣetre cittaṃ saṃpreṣya upapattaye kuśalamūlāni ca pariṇāmayitavyāni
K07bsu033_u:876: ye punastaṃ tathāgataṃ na bhūyo manasikariṣyanti,
K07bsu033_u:878: teṣāṃ tādṛśenaiva so 'mitābhastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho varṇasaṃsthānārohapariṇāhena bhikṣusaṃghaparivāreṇa ca tādṛśa eva buddhinirmito maraṇakālasamaye purataḥ sthāsyati /
K07bsu033_u:879: te tenaiva tathāgatadarśanaprasādālambanena samādhinā apramuṣitayā smṛtyā cyutāstatraiva buddhakṣetre pratyājaniṣyanti // Sukhv_28 //
K07bsu033_u:883: gambhīreṣu ca dharmeṣu bhāṣyamāṇeṣu tuṣṭiṃ pratilapsyante,
K07bsu033_u:893: imaṃ khalvānanda arthavaśaṃ saṃpaśya tathāgatā daśasu dikṣu aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāsu lokadhātuṣu
K07bsu033_u:894: tasyāmitābhasya tathāgatasya nāmagheyaṃ parikīrtayanto varṇaṃ ghoṣayantaḥ saṃpraśaṃsāmabhyudīrayanti /
K07bsu033_u:895: tasmin khalu punarānanda buddhakṣetre daśabhyo digbhya ekaikasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukāsamā
K07bsu033_u:896: bodhisattvāstamamitābhaṃ tathāgatamupasaṃkramanti darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya paripraśnīkaraṇāya,
K07bsu033_u:897: taṃ ca bodhisattvagaṇaṃ tāṃśca buddhakṣetraguṇālaṃkāravyūhasaṃpadviśeṣān draṣṭum // Sukhv_30 //
K07bsu033_u:899: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimamevārthaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā paridīpayannimā gāthā abhāṣata -
K07bsu033_u:900: yathaiva gaṅgānadīvālukāsamā buddhāna kṣetrā amitāyunāyakam // Sukhv_vs_28 //
K07bsu033_u:902: bahupuṣpapūṭī gṛhītva te nānāvarṇaṃ surabhī manoramāṃ /
K07bsu033_u:904: tatha dakṣiṇapaścimottarāsu buddhāna kṣetrā daśatāsu yāttakāḥ /
K07bsu033_u:905: yato yato āgami buddha vandituṃ sabodhisattvā amitāyunāyakam // Sukhv_vs_30 //
K07bsu033_u:908: pūjitva vā te bahubodhisattvā vanditva pādāmamitaprabhasya /
K07bsu033_u:909: pradakṣiṇīkṛtya vadanti caivaṃ aho 'dbhutaṃ śobhati buddhakṣetram // Sukhv_vs_32 //
K07bsu033_u:910: te puṣpapūṭīhi punokiranti udagracittā atulāya prītiye /
K07bsu033_u:911: kāmaṃ prabhāṣanti purasta nāyake asmāpi kṣetraṃ siya evarūpam // Sukhv_vs_33 //
K07bsu033_u:912: ye puṣpapūṭā iti kṣipta tatra chatraṃtayā saṃsthihi yojanāśatam /
K07bsu033_u:913: svalaṃkṛtaṃ śobhati citraravato chādante buddhasya samanta kāyam // Sukhv_vs_34 //
K07bsu033_u:914: te bodhisattvā tathā satkaritvā kathaṃ karontī iti tuṣṭa tatra /
K07bsu033_u:915: sulabdha lābhāḥ khalu tehi sattvaiḥ yehī śrutaṃ nāma narottamasya // Sukhv_vs_35 //
K07bsu033_u:916: asmehi pī lābha sulabdhapūrvā yadā gatāsya ima buddhakṣetram /
K07bsu033_u:917: paśyātha svapnopama maitra kīdṛśaṃ yatkalpitaṃ kalpasahasra śāstuḥ // Sukhv_vs_36 //
K07bsu033_u:919: paśyātha buddhā vara puṇyarāśiḥ parivṛto śobhati bodhisattvaiḥ /
K07bsu033_u:920: amitābhasya ābhā amitā ca tejā amitaṃ ca āyūramitaśca saṃghaḥ // Sukhv_vs_37 //
K07bsu033_u:922: ye niścaritvā mukhamaṇḍalātaḥ sphūranti kṣetrāṇi sahasrakoṭīḥ // Sukhv_vs_38 //
K07bsu033_u:923: tāḥ sarvasūrīḥ punaretya tatra mūrdhe ca astaṃ gami nāyakasya /
K07bsu033_u:924: devā manuṣyā janayanti prītiṃ arcistadā asyamidāṃ viditvā // Sukhv_vs_39 //
K07bsu033_u:925: uttiṣṭhate buddhasuto mahāyaśā nātha so hi avalokiteśvaraḥ /
K07bsu033_u:926: ko heturatra bhagavaṃ kaḥ pratyayo yena smitaṃ kurvasi lokanātha // Sukhv_vs_40 //
K07bsu033_u:927: taṃ vyākarohī yatra so 'rthakovido hitānukampī bahusattvamocakaḥ /
K07bsu033_u:928: śrutveti vācaṃ paramāṃ manoramāṃ udagracittā bhaviṣyanti sattvāḥ // Sukhv_vs_41 //
K07bsu033_u:929: ye bodhisattvā bahulokadhātutaḥ sukhāvatīṃ prasthita buddha paśyatāṃ /
K07bsu033_u:930: te śrutvā prītiṃ vipulāṃ janetvā kṣipramimaṃ kṣetra vilokayeyuḥ // Sukhv_vs_42 //
K07bsu033_u:931: āgatya ca kṣetramidaṃ udāraṃ ṛddhībalaṃ prāpuṇi kṣiprameva /
K07bsu033_u:932: divyaṃ ca cakṣustatha śrotra divyaṃ jātismarāḥ pāramikovidāśca // Sukhv_vs_43 //
K07bsu033_u:933: amitāyu buddhastada vyākaroti mama hyayaṃ praṇidhi babhūva pūrvam /
K07bsu033_u:934: kathaṃ pi sattvā śruṇiyāni nāma vrajeyu kṣetraṃ mama nityameva // Sukhv_vs_44 //
K07bsu033_u:936: sa me ayaṃ praṇidhi prapūrṇa śobhanā sattvāśca ebhi bahulokadhātutaḥ /
K07bsu033_u:937: āgatya kṣipraṃ mama antikasmiṃ avaivartikā bhontiha ekajātiyā // Sukhv_vs_45 //
K07bsu033_u:938: tasmādya icchatiha bodhisattvaḥ mamāpi kṣetraṃ siya evarūpam /
K07bsu033_u:939: ahaṃ pi sattvān bahu mocayeyaṃ nāmena ghoṣeṇa tha darśanena // Sukhv_vs_46 //
K07bsu033_u:940: sa śīghraśīghraṃ tvaramāṇarūpaḥ sukhāvatīṃ gacchatu lokadhātum /
K07bsu033_u:941: gattvā ca pūrvamamitaprabhasya pūjetu buddhāna sahasrakoṭīḥ // Sukhv_vs_47 //
K07bsu033_u:942: buddhāna koṭī bahu pūjayitvā ṛddhībalena bahu kṣetra gattvā /
K07bsu033_u:943: kṛtvāna pūjāṃ sugatāna santike bhaktyā gamiṣyanti sukhāvatītaḥ // Sukhv_vs_48 //
K07bsu033_u:946: tasya khalu punarānanda amitāyuṣastathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya bodhivṛkṣaḥ /
K07bsu033_u:949: sadāpatraḥ sadāpuṣpaḥ sadāphalo nānāvarṇo 'nekaśatasahasravarṇo nānāpatro nānāpuṣpo
K07bsu033_u:955: tasya khalu punarānanda bodhivṛkṣasya vātasamīritasya yaḥ śabdo ghoṣo niścarati so 'parimāṇāṃllokadhātūn vijñāpayati /
K07bsu033_u:956: tatrānanda yeṣāṃ sattvānāṃ sa bodhivṛkṣaḥ śrotrāvabhāsamāgacchati,
K07bsu033_u:960: ye khalu punarānanda sattvāstato bodhivṛkṣādgandhaṃ jighranti,
K07bsu033_u:961: teṣāṃ yāvadbodhiparyantaṃ na jātu ghrāṇaroagaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ /
K07bsu033_u:963: teṣāṃ yāvadbodhiparyantaṃ na jātu jihvārogaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ /
K07bsu033_u:965: bhavanti, teṣāṃ yāvadbodhiparyantaṃ na jātu kāyarogaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ /
K07bsu033_u:966: ye ca khalu punarānanda sattvāstaṃ bodhivṛkṣaṃ dharmato nidhyāyanti,
K07bsu033_u:967: teṣāṃ tata upādāya yāvadbodhiparyantaṃ na jātu cittavikṣepaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ /
K07bsu033_u:968: sarve ca te sattvāḥ sahadarśanāttasya bodhivṛkṣasyāvaivartikāḥ saṃtiṣṭhante yadutānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
K07bsu033_u:973: tatraiva khalu punarānanda ye bodhisattvāḥ pratyājātāḥ pratyājāyante pratyājaniṣyante vā,
K07bsu033_u:974: sarve te ekajātipratibaddhāstata evānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante sthāpayitvā
K07bsu033_u:975: praṇidhānavaśaṃ ye te bodhisattvā mahāsiṃhanādanādina udārasaṃnāhasaṃnaddhāḥ sarvasattvaparinirvāṇābhiyuktāśca // Sukhv_33 //
K07bsu033_u:977: tasmina khalu punarānanda buddhakṣetre ye śrāvakānte vyāmaprabhāḥ,
K07bsu033_u:979: sthāpayitvā dvau bodhisattvau yayoḥ prabhayā sā lokadhātuḥ satatasamitaṃ nityāvabhāsasphuṭā /
K07bsu033_u:980: atha khalvāyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat - kiṃnāmadheyau bhagavaṃstau bodhisattvau mahāsattvau?
K07bsu033_u:981: bhagavānāha - ekastayorānanda avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ dvitīyo mahāsthāmaprāpto nāma /
K07bsu033_u:982: ita eva cānanda buddhakṣetrāccyutā tau tatropapannau // Sukhv_34 //
K07bsu033_u:984: tatra cānanda buddhakṣetre ye bodhisattvāḥ pratyājātāḥ,
K07bsu033_u:989: tasmin khalu punarānanda buddhakṣetre ye bodhisattvā pratyājātāḥ,
K07bsu033_u:991: sarve te tata upādāya na jātu jātismarā bhaviṣyanti sthāpayitvā tathārūpeṣu kalpasaṃkṣobheṣu
K07bsu033_u:992: ye pūrvasthānapraṇihitāḥ pañcasu kaṣāyeṣu vartamāneṣu yadā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ loke
K07bsu033_u:993: prādurbhāvo bhavati tadyathāpi nāma mamaitarhi // Sukhv_36 //
K07bsu033_u:995: tasmin khalu punarānanda buddhakṣetre ye bodhisattvāḥ pratyājātāḥ,
K07bsu033_u:996: sarve te ekapurobhaktenānyāṃllokadhātūn gatvā anekāni buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇyupatiṣṭhanti yāvadākāṅkṣanti buddhānubhāvena /
K07bsu033_u:997: te yathā yathā cittamutpādayanti evamevaṃrūpaiḥ puṣpadhūpadīpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākāvaijayantītūryasaṃgītivādyaiḥ pūjāṃ kuryāma iti,
K07bsu033_u:998: teṣāṃ sahacittotpādāttathārūpāṇi ca sarvapūjāvidhānāni pāṇau prādurbhavanti /
K07bsu033_u:999: te taiḥ puṣpairyāvadvādyaisteṣu buddheṣu bhagavatsu pūjāṃ kurvanto bahvaparimāṇāsaṃkhyeyaṃ kuśalamupacinvanti /
K07bsu033_u:1001: teṣāṃ sahacittotpādānnānāvarṇā anekavarṇā nānāgandhā divyāḥ puṣpapuṭāḥ pāṇau prādurbhavanti /
K07bsu033_u:1002: te taistathārūpaiḥ puṣpapuṭaistān buddhān bhagavato 'vakiranti abhyavakiranti abhiprakiranti /
K07bsu033_u:1003: teṣāṃ ca yaḥ sarvaparītaḥ puṣpapuṭa (Sukhv, Vaidya 246)
K07bsu033_u:1004: utsṛṣṭaḥ sa daśayojanavistaraṃ puṣpacchatraṃ prādurbhavati uparyantarīkṣe /
K07bsu033_u:1005: dvitīye cānutsṛṣṭe na prathamo dharaṇyāṃ prapatati /
K07bsu033_u:1006: santi tatra puṣpapuṭā ya utsṛṣṭāḥ santo viṃśatiyojanavistārāṇi puṣpacchatrāṇyuparyantarīkṣe prādurbhavanti /
K07bsu033_u:1011: te bahvaparimitamasaṃkhyeyaṃ kuśalamūlamavaropya bahūni ca buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇyupasthāya
K07bsu033_u:1012: ekapūrvāhṇena punarapi sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau pratiṣṭhante tasyaivāmitāyuṣastathāgatasya
K07bsu033_u:1016: tasmin khalu punarānanda buddhakṣetre ye sattvāḥ pratyājātāḥ,
K07bsu033_u:1018: na ca tatra buddhakṣetre sattvānāṃ kācitparigrahasaṃjñāsti /
K07bsu033_u:1019: te sarve ca tadbuddhakṣetramanucaṃkramamāṇā anuvicaranto na ratiṃ nāratimutpādayanti /
K07bsu033_u:1023: tatra khalu punarānanda sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau ye sattvāḥ pratyājātāḥ,
K07bsu033_u:1030: samacittā maitracittā mṛducittāḥ snigdhacittāḥ karmaṇyacittāḥ prasannacittāḥ sthiracittā
K07bsu033_u:1038: prajñācakṣurgatiṃgatā dharmacakṣuḥpāragatā buddhacakṣurniṣpādayanto darśayanto dyotayanto vistareṇa prakāśayanto 'saṅgajñānamabhinirharanti
K07bsu033_u:1044: niṣkiṃcanā nirupādānā niścintā nirupadhayo 'nupādāya suvimuktā anaṅgaṇā aparyasthāyino
K07bsu033_u:1045: 'bhijñāsu amūlasthāyino 'saṅgācārikā anavalīnā gambhīreṣu dharmeṣvabhiyuktā na saṃsīdanti
K07bsu033_u:1079: dharmolkāṃ prajvālayantaḥ prajñāvilokino 'saṃmūḍhā nirdoṣāḥ śāntakhilāḥ śuddhā nirāmagandhā
K07bsu033_u:1080: alubdhāḥ saṃvibhāgaratā muktatyāgāḥ prasṛtapāṇayo dānasaṃvibhāgaratā dharmāmiṣābhyāṃ
K07bsu033_u:1081: dāne 'matsariṇo 'saṃsṛṣṭā urtrastamānasā viraktā dhīrā dhaureyā dhṛtimanto hrīmantaḥ
K07bsu033_u:1082: suvyūḍhasattvā nirgāḍhāḥ prāptābhijñāḥ suratāḥ sukhasaṃvāsā arthakarā lokapradyotā
K07bsu033_u:1084: śokāpagatā nirmalā nimeṣaprahīṇā vikrīḍitābhijñā hetubalikāḥ praṇidhānabalikā ajihmā
K07bsu033_u:1086: śuddhāḥ śuddhādhimuktā jinabalapraśastā lokapaṇḍitā uttaptajñānasamudāgatā jinasutāścittaudbilyasamanvāgatāḥ
K07bsu033_u:1087: śūrā dṛḍhā amamā akhilā atulā arajaskāḥ sahitā udārā ṛṣabhā hrīmanto dhṛtimantaḥ
K07bsu033_u:1088: smṛtimanto matimanto gatimantaḥ prajñāśastrapraharaṇā puṇyavanto dyutimanto vyapagatakhilā
K07bsu033_u:1090: īdṛśā ānanda tasmin buddhakṣetre sattvāḥ saṃkṣiptena ca /
K07bsu033_u:1095: ubhayamapyeva ānanda acintyamatulyaṃ yadidaṃ teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ guṇāstathāgatasya cānuttaraprajñāpratibhānam // Sukhv_38 //
K07bsu033_u:1099: eṣā sā dig yatra sa bhagavānamitābhastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati,
K07bsu033_u:1100: dharmaṃ ca deśayati virajo viśuddhaṃ yasya tannāmadheyamanāvaraṇe daśadiśi loke vighuṣṭam
K07bsu033_u:1101: ekaikasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukāsamā buddhā bhagavanto varṇayanti stuvanti praśaṃsantyasakṛdasakṛdasaṅgavācāprativākyāḥ /
K07bsu033_u:1102: evamukte āyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat - icchāmyahaṃ bhagavaṃstamamitābhamamitaprabhamamitāyuṣaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ draṣṭum,
K07bsu033_u:1105: vāk, atha tāvadeva so 'mitābhastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ svapāṇitalāttathārūpaṃ
K07bsu033_u:1106: raśmiṃ prāmuñcadyadidaṃ koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ mahatāvabhāsena sphuṭamabhūt /
K07bsu033_u:1107: tena khalu punaḥ samayena sarvatra koṭīśatasahasrabuddhakṣetrāṇāṃ ye kecitkālaparvatā
K07bsu033_u:1110: tāni sarvāṇi tasya tathāgatasya tayā prabhayābhinirbhinnānyabhūvan samabhibhūtāni /
K07bsu033_u:1111: tadyathāpi nāma puruṣo vyāmamātrake 'nvito dvitīyaṃ puruṣaṃ pratyavekṣedāditye 'bhyudgate,
K07bsu033_u:1114: parvatarājaṃ sarvakṣetrābhyudgataṃ sarvā diśo 'bhibhūya bhāsamānaṃ tapantaṃ virocamānaṃ vibhrājamānam,
K07bsu033_u:1115: taṃ ca mahāntaṃ bodhisattvagaṇaṃ taṃ ca bhikṣusaṃghaṃ yadidaṃ buddhānubhāvena tasyāḥ prabhāyāḥ pariśuddhatvāt /
K07bsu033_u:1117: tatra na vṛkṣā na parvatā na dvīpā na tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatayo na nadīśvabhraprapātāḥ prajñāpayeran,
K07bsu033_u:1119: evameva tasmin buddhakṣetre nāstyanyatkiṃcilliṅgaṃ vā nimittaṃ vā anyatraiva vyāmaprabhāḥ śrāvakāste ca yojanakoṭīśatasahasraprabhā bodhisattvāḥ
K07bsu033_u:1120: sa ca bhagavānamitābhastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastaṃ ca śrāvakagaṇaṃ taṃ ca bodhisattvagaṇamabhibhūya sarvā diśaḥ prabhāsayan saṃdṛśyate
K07bsu033_u:1121: tena khalvapi samayena tasyāṃ sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau bodhisattvāḥ śrāvakadevamanuṣyāśca
K07bsu033_u:1122: sarve te imāḥ sahālokadhātuṃ śākyamuniṃ ca tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhamarhatā
K07bsu033_u:1123: bhikṣusaṃghena parivṛtaṃ paśyanti sma dharmaṃ deśayantam // Sukhv_39 //
K07bsu033_u:1125: tatra khalu bhagavānajitaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamāmantrayate sma - paśyasi tvamajita amuṣmina buddhakṣetre guṇālaṃkāravyūhasaṃpadam?
K07bsu033_u:1130: bhagavānāha - paśyasi punastvamajita etānamarān dvijasaṃghān sarvabuddhakṣetraṃ buddhasvareṇābhivijñāpayantaṃ yenaite bodhisattvā nityamavirahitā
K07bsu033_u:1132: bhagavānāha - paśyasi punastvamajita atra buddhakṣetre 'mūn sattvān yojanaśatasahasrikeṣu vimāneṣvabhirūḍhānantarīkṣe sasatkārān krāmantaḥ?
K07bsu033_u:1134: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase ajita asti kiṃcinnānātvaṃ devānāṃ paranirmitavaśavartināṃ sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau manuṣyāṇāṃ vā?
K07bsu033_u:1135: ajita āha - ekamapyahaṃ bhagavan nānātvaṃ na samanupaśyāmi yāvanmaharddhikā atra sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau manuṣyāḥ /
K07bsu033_u:1136: bhagavānāha - paśyasi punastvamajita tatra sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāveteṣāṃ manuṣyāṇāmudāreṣu padmeṣu garbhāvāsam?
K07bsu033_u:1137: āha - tadyathāpi nāma devāstrāyastriṃśā devā yāmā vā pañcāśadyojanikeṣu vā (Sukhv, Sukhv, Vaidya 249)
K07bsu033_u:1138: yojanaśatikeṣu vā pañcayojanaśatikeṣu vā vimāneṣu praviṣṭāḥ krīḍanti ramanti paricārayanti,
K07bsu033_u:1139: evamevāhaṃ bhagavan atra sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāveteṣāṃ manuṣyāṇāmudāreṣu padmeṣu garbhāvāsaṃ paśyāmi // Sukhv_40 //
K07bsu033_u:1141: santi khalu punaratra bhagavan sattvā ya aupapādukāḥ padmeṣu paryaṅkaiḥ prādurbhavanti /
K07bsu033_u:1142: tatko 'tra bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo yadanye garbhāvāsaṃ prativasanti,
K07bsu033_u:1144: bhagavānāha - ye te ajita bodhisattvā anyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu sthitāḥ sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvupapattaye vicikitsāmutpādayanti,
K07bsu033_u:1147: ye punarnirvicikitsāmutpādya cchinnakāṅkṣāḥ sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvupapattaye kuśalamūlānyavaropayanti,
K07bsu033_u:1150: ye te ajita bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anyatra buddhakṣetreṣu sthitāścittamutpādayanti amitābhasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya darśanāya,
K07bsu033_u:1154: teṣāmaupapādukānāṃ paryaṅkaiḥ prādurbhūtānāṃ muhūrtamātreṇa evaṃrūpaḥ kāyo bhavati tadyathānyeṣāṃ ciropapannānāṃ sattvānām /
K07bsu033_u:1155: paśya ajita prajñāviśeṣaṃ prajñāvaimātryaṃ prajñāparihāṇiṃ prajñāparīttatām - yattu
K07bsu033_u:1157: kuśalamūlacaryāyāḥ parihīṇā bhavanti sarvakuśalamūlasaṃpattibhiḥ yadidaṃ vicikitsāpatitaiḥ saṃjñāmanasikāraiḥ /
K07bsu033_u:1158: tadyathāpi nāma ajita rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya bandhanāgāraṃ bhavetsarvasauvarṇavaiḍūryapratyuptamavasaktapaṭṭamālyadāmakalāpaṃ
K07bsu033_u:1162: tatra tasya sa rājñaḥ putraḥ kenacideva kṛtyena prakṣipya jāmbūnadasuvarṇamayairnigaḍairbaddho bhavati /
K07bsu033_u:1163: tasya ca tatra paryaṅkaḥ prajñaptaḥ syādanekagoṇikāstīrṇastūlikāparṇakāstīrṇaḥ kāliṅgaprāvaraṇapratyāstaraṇasottarapadacchada ubhayāntalohitopadhānaścitro darśanīyaḥ /
K07bsu033_u:1164: sa tatra tadābhiṣaṇṇo vā abhisaṃpanno vā bhavet /
K07bsu033_u:1165: bahu cāsyānekavidhaṃ śuci vinītaṃ pānabhojanaṃ tatropanāmyeta /
K07bsu033_u:1166: tatkiṃ manyase ajita udārastasya rājaputrasya sa paribhogo bhavet?
K07bsu033_u:1168: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase ajita api tvāsvādayettatra niśāmayecca,
K07bsu033_u:1171: api tu khalu punaryadyapanītya rājñā tatra bandhanāgāre prakṣipto bhavet,
K07bsu033_u:1173: abhijātān kumārānamātyān stryāgārān śreṣṭhino gṛhapatīn koṭṭarājāṃśca paryeṣayet,
K07bsu033_u:1175: kiṃcāpi bhagavaṃstasya rājakumārasya tatra bandhānāgāre nābhiratiḥ,
K07bsu033_u:1178: bhagavānāha - evameva ajita ye te bodhisattvā vicikitsāpatitāḥ kuśalamūlānyavaropayanti, (Sukhv, Vaidya 250)
K07bsu033_u:1180: kiṃcāpi tena buddhanāmaśravaṇena tena ca cittaprasādamātreṇa atra sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvupapadyante,
K07bsu033_u:1181: na tu khalvaupapādukāḥ padmeṣu paryaṅkaiḥ prādurbhavanti,
K07bsu033_u:1187: api tu khalu punaḥ pañca varṣaśatāni virahitā bhavanti buddhadarśanena dharmaśravaṇena bodhisattvadarśanena dharmasāṃkathyaviniścayena sarvakuśalamūlena dharmacaryābhiśca /
K07bsu033_u:1188: kiṃcāpi te tatra nābhiramante na tuṣṭiṃ vijānanti,
K07bsu033_u:1189: api tu khalu punaḥ pūrvāparān kṣapayitsate bhūyastataḥ paścānniskrāmanti /
K07bsu033_u:1190: na caiṣāṃ tato niṣkrāmatāṃ niṣkramaḥ prajñāyate ūrdhvamadhastiryagvā /
K07bsu033_u:1191: paśya ajita etarhi nāma pañcabhirvarṣaśatairbahūni buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasropasthānāni syurbahvaparimāṇāsaṃkhyeyāprameyāṇi ca kuśalamūlānyavaropayitavyāni
K07bsu033_u:1193: paśya ajita kiyanmahate 'narthāya bodhisattvānāṃ vicikitsā saṃvartata iti /
K07bsu033_u:1194: tasmāttarhi ajita bodhisattvairnirvicikitsairbodhaye cittamutpādya kṣipraṃ sarvasattvahitasukhādhānāya
K07bsu033_u:1198: evamukte ajito bodhisattvo bhagavantametadavocat - kiṃ punarbhagavan bodhisattvā
K07bsu033_u:1199: ito buddhakṣetrātpariniṣpannā anyeṣāṃ vā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmantikātsukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvupapatsyante?
K07bsu033_u:1200: bhagavānāha - ito hyajita buddhakṣetrād dvāsaptatikoṭīniyutāni bodhisattvānāṃ pariniṣpannāni
K07bsu033_u:1202: kaḥ punarvādastataḥ parīttataraiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ duṣprasahasya tathāgatasyāntikādaṣṭādaśakoṭīniyutaśatāni bodhisattvānāṃ sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvupapatsyante
K07bsu033_u:1203: pūrvāntare digbhāge ratnākaro nāma tathāgato viharati /
K07bsu033_u:1220: amitābhasya tathāgatasya darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya paripṛcchanāya paripraśnīkaraṇāya /
K07bsu033_u:1221: etena ajita paryāyeṇa paripūrṇakalpakoṭīniyutaṃ nāmadheyāni parikīrtayeyaṃ teṣāṃ
K07bsu033_u:1222: tathāgatānāṃ yebhyaste bodhisattvā upasaṃkrāmanti sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau tamamitābhaṃ
K07bsu033_u:1226: paśya ajita kiyatsulabdhalābhāste sattvā ye 'mitābhasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya nāmadheyaṃ śroṣyanti /
K07bsu033_u:1227: nāpi te sattvā hīnādhimuktikā bhaviṣyanti ye 'ntaśaekacittaprasādamapi tasmiṃstathāgate 'bhilapyante,
K07bsu033_u:1230: prativedayāmi sadevakasya lokasya purato 'sya dharmaparyāyasya śrāvaṇāya /
K07bsu033_u:1231: trisāhasramahāsāhasramapi lokadhātumagnipūrṇamavagāhya atikramaikacittotpādamapi pratisāro na kartavyaḥ /
K07bsu033_u:1233: bodhisattvakoṭyo hyajita aśravaṇādeṣāmevaṃrūpāṇāṃ dharmaparyāyāṇāṃ vivartante 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
K07bsu033_u:1234: tasmādasya dharmaparyāyasyādhyāśayena śravaṇodgrahaṇadhāraṇārthaṃ paryāvāptaye vistareṇa saṃprakāśāya bhāvanārthaṃ ca sumahadvīryamārabdhavyam
K07bsu033_u:1238: śāstṛsaṃjñā ca tatropādhyāye kartavyā ya icchati kṣipramaparimitān sattvānavaivartikatve 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ pratiṣṭhāpayitum,
K07bsu033_u:1239: tacca tasya bhagavato 'mitābhasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetraṃ draṣṭum,
K07bsu033_u:1241: api tu khalu ajita atyarthaṃ sulabdhalābhāste sattvā avaropitakuśalamūlāḥ pūrvajinakṛtādhikārā buddhādhiṣṭhitāśca bhaviṣyanti,
K07bsu033_u:1242: yeṣāmanāgate 'dhvani yāvatsaddharmavipralope vartamāne ime evaṃrūpā udārā dharmaparyāyāḥ
K07bsu033_u:1245: ye śrutvā codāraprītiprāmodyaṃ pratilapsyanta udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti parebhyo vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyanti,
K07bsu033_u:1250: iti hi ajita yattathāgatena kartavyam, kṛtaṃ mayā /
K07bsu033_u:1259: asya khalu punarajita dharmaparyāyasya mahatīṃ parīndanāṃ karomi /
K07bsu033_u:1264: atha khalu punarbhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
K07bsu033_u:1265: na me akṛtapuṇyānāṃ śravā bheṣyanti īdṛśāḥ /
K07bsu033_u:1266: ye tu te śūra siddhārthāḥ śroṣyanti ca imāṃ giram // Sukhv_vs_49 //
K07bsu033_u:1267: dṛṣṭo yaiśca hi saṃbuddho lokanāthaḥ prabhaṃkaraḥ //
K07bsu033_u:1268: sagauravaiḥ śruto dharmaḥ prītiṃ prāpsyanti te parām // Sukhv_vs_50 //
K07bsu033_u:1269: na śakta hīnehi kusīdadṛṣṭibhiḥ buddhāna dharmeṣu prasāda vinditum /
K07bsu033_u:1270: ye buddhakṣetreṣu akārṣi pūjāṃ trailokanāthāna caryāsu śikṣiṣu // Sukhv_vs_51 //
K07bsu033_u:1271: yathāndhakāre puruṣo hyacakṣuḥ mārgaṃ na jāne kutu saṃprakāśayet /
K07bsu033_u:1272: sarvaṃ tathā śrāvaka buddhajñāne ajānakāḥ kiṃ punaradya sattvāḥ // Sukhv_vs_52 //
K07bsu033_u:1273: buddho hi buddhasya guṇāṃ prajānate na devanāgāsurayakṣaśrāvakāḥ /
K07bsu033_u:1274: anekabuddhāna pi no gatī yatho buddhasya jñāne hi prakāśyamāne // Sukhv_vs_53 //
K07bsu033_u:1275: yadi sarvasattvāḥ samatā bhaveyuḥ viśuddhajñāne paramārthakovidāḥ /
K07bsu033_u:1276: te kalpakoṭīratha vāpi uttare naikasya buddhasya guṇān katheyuḥ // Sukhv_vs_54 //
K07bsu033_u:1277: atrāntare nirvṛta te bhaveyuḥ prakāśamānā bahukalpakoṭīḥ /
K07bsu033_u:1278: na ca buddhajñānasya pramāṇu labhyate tathā hi jñānāścaryaṃ jinānām // Sukhv_vs_55 //
K07bsu033_u:1279: tasmānnaraḥ paṇḍita vijñajātiyaḥ yo mahya vākyamabhiśraddadheya /
K07bsu033_u:1280: kṛtsnāṃ sa sākṣājjinajñānamārgān buddhaḥ prajānaṃ ti girāmudīrayet // Sukhv_vs_56 //
K07bsu033_u:1281: kadāci labhyati manuṣyalābhaḥ kadāci buddhāna pi prādurbhāvaḥ /
K07bsu033_u:1283: śraddhārthaprajñā sucireṇa labhyate tasyārthaprāptyai janayet vīryam // Sukhv_vs_57 //
K07bsu033_u:1284: ya īdṛśāṃ dharma śruṇitva śreṣṭhāṃ labhyanti prītiṃ sugataṃ smarantaḥ /
K07bsu033_u:1285: te mitramasmākamatītamadhvani ye cāpi bodhāya jananti chandam // Sukhv_vs_58 //
K07bsu033_u:1288: asmin khalu punardharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe dvādaśānāṃ sattvaniyutakoṭīnāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurviśuddham /
K07bsu033_u:1293: sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvupapattaye ca kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni bhagavato 'mitābhasya tathāgatasya darśanakāmatayā /
K07bsu033_u:1294: sarve ca te tatropapadya anupūrveṇa mañjusvarā nāma tathāgatā anyeṣu lokadhātuṣūpapatsyante /
K07bsu033_u:1295: aśītiśca niyutakoṭyo dīpaṃkare tathāgate labdhakṣāntikā avaivartikā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheramitāyuṣaiva
K07bsu033_u:1296: tathāgatena paripācitāḥ pūrvabodhisattvacaryāṃ carantastāśca sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvupapadya
K07bsu033_u:1306: ajito bodhisattvo mahāsattva āyuṣmāṃścānandaḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragaruḍagandharvasya loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti
